channel.title: Electronero
channel.description: Electronero is a digital currency that is secure, private, and untraceable.

item.title: Monero 0.12.0.0 "Lithium Luna" Release
item.description: A major update that is ready for the April 5th network upgrade

item.title: A Scheduled Network Upgrade is Planned for April 6
item.description: A scheduled network upgrade is planned for April 6. To be sufficiently prepared, please run CLI v0.12.0.0 or GUI v0.12.0.0

item.description: Small elaboration on the Core Team's role and an announcement on its membership

item.title: PoW change and key reuse
item.description: Monero will tweak Cryptonight, and how key reuse can compromise your privacy
